column2: #query our database, return the result as xml
call dbDisconnect() when finished working with a connection
# synthesize xml output via the sql query

query <- "SELECT '<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>' || XMLELEMENT(NAME \"judge_ratings\", XMLFOREST(judge_name, CONT, INTG, DMNR, DILG, CFMG, DECI, PREP, FAMI, ORAL, WRIT, PHYS)) FROM judge_ratings"
